TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Constants extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 创建一个允许用户调用 ASP.NET 事件处理程序的 UI 元素并提供一种将用户输入从 UI 元素回发到服务器的方式。

span.span: Creates a UI element that allows user invocation of ASP.NET event handlers and provides a way to post user input from UI elements back to the server.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表描述了只读的类可以使用的成员。The following table describes the read-only class members you can use. |成员Member|描述Description| |------------|-----------------| |AlternatingItemTemplateTagAlternatingItemTemplateTag|包含 AlternatingItem 模板的标记名。Contains the tag name for the AlternatingItem template.| |ContentTemplateTagContentTemplateTag|包含 Content 模板的标记名。Contains the tag name for the Content template.| |DefaultSessionsStateHistorySizeDefaultSessionsStateHistorySize|包含历史记录堆栈的默认深度。Contains the default depth of the history stack.| |EventArgumentIDEventArgumentID|与回发事件关联的参数。The argument associated with the postback event.| |EventSourceIDEventSourceID|包含事件目标（生成回发的控件）的查询字符串名称。Contains the query String name of the event target (the control that generated the postback).| |FooterTemplateTagFooterTemplateTag|包含 Footer 模板的标记名。Contains the tag name for the Footer template.| |FormIDPrefixFormIDPrefix|在 URL 中包含窗体的前缀。Contains the prefix of a form in a URL.| |HeaderTemplateTagHeaderTemplateTag|包含 HeaderTemplate 的标记名。Contains the tag name for the HeaderTemplate.| |ItemDetailsTemplateTagItemDetailsTemplateTag|包含 ItemDetails 模板的标记名。Contains the tag name for the ItemDetails template.| |ItemTemplateTagItemTemplateTag|包含 Item 模板的标记名。Contains the tag name for the Item template.| |LabelTemplateTagLabelTemplateTag|包含 Label 模板的标记名。Contains the tag name for the Label template.| |OptimumPageWeightParameterOptimumPageWeightParameter|包含默认页权重。Contains the default page weight.| |PagePrefixPagePrefix|包含用于确保回发中的页编号正确的页码分隔符。Contains a page number delimiter used to ensure proper page numbering in a postback.| |ScreenCharactersHeightParameterScreenCharactersHeightParameter|包含屏幕上字符高度的默认值。Contains the default for the height of the characters on the screen.| |ScriptTemplateTagScriptTemplateTag|包含 Script 模板的标记名。Contains the tag name for the Script template.| |SelectionListSpecialCharacterSelectionListSpecialCharacter|包含 cHTML 的 CheckBox ID 中使用的字符。Contains the character used in CheckBox IDs for cHTML.| |SeparatorTemplateTagSeparatorTemplateTag|包含 Separator 模板的标记名。Contains the tag name for the Separator template.| |SymbolProtocolSymbolProtocol|包含用于表示 i-mode 或 J-Phone 符号方案的开头的字符。Contains the characters used to denote the beginning of an i-mode or J-Phone symbol scheme.| |UniqueFilePathSuffixVariableUniqueFilePathSuffixVariable|包含唯一文件路径后缀的查询字符串名称。Contains the query String name of the unique file path suffix.| |UniqueFilePathSuffixVariableWithoutEqualUniqueFilePathSuffixVariableWithoutEqual|包含唯一文件路径后缀的查询字符串名称，但不带等号。Contains the query String name of the unique file path suffix, but no equal sign.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks AlternatingItemTemplateTagAlternatingItemTemplateTag 包含 AlternatingItem 模板的标记名。Contains the tag name for the AlternatingItem template. ContentTemplateTagContentTemplateTag 包含 Content 模板的标记名。Contains the tag name for the Content template. DefaultSessionsStateHistorySizeDefaultSessionsStateHistorySize 包含默认 SessionsState 历史记录大小。Contains the default SessionsState history size. EventArgumentIDEventArgumentID 包含事件参数 id。Contains the Event Argument ID. EventSourceIDEventSourceID 包含事件源 id。Contains the Event Source ID. FooterTemplateTagFooterTemplateTag 包含 Footer 模板的标记名。Contains the tag name for the Footer template. FormIDPrefixFormIDPrefix 包含窗体 ID 前缀。Contains the Form ID prefix. HeaderTemplateTagHeaderTemplateTag 包含有关标头的模板的标记名。Contains the tag name for the Header template. ItemDetailsTemplateTagItemDetailsTemplateTag 包含 ItemDetails 模板的标记名。Contains the tag name for the ItemDetails template. ItemTemplateTagItemTemplateTag 包含 Item 模板的标记名。Contains the tag name for the Item template. LabelTemplateTagLabelTemplateTag 包含 Label 模板的标记名。Contains the tag name for the Label template. OptimumPageWeightParameterOptimumPageWeightParameter 包含的最佳页权重参数。Contains the optimum page weight parameter. PagePrefixPagePrefix 包含页的前缀。Contains the page prefix. ScreenCharactersHeightParameterScreenCharactersHeightParameter 包含屏幕字符高度参数。Contains the screen characters height parameter. ScriptTemplateTagScriptTemplateTag 包含 Script 模板的标记名。Contains the tag name for the Script template. SelectionListSpecialCharacterSelectionListSpecialCharacter 包含选择列表中的特殊字符。Contains the selection list special character. SeparatorTemplateTagSeparatorTemplateTag 包含 Separator 模板的标记名。Contains the tag name for the Separator template. SymbolProtocolSymbolProtocol 包含符号协议。Contains the symbol protocol. UniqueFilePathSuffixVariableUniqueFilePathSuffixVariable 包含唯一文件路径后缀变量。Contains the unique file path suffix variable. UniqueFilePathSuffixVariableWithoutEqualUniqueFilePathSuffixVariableWithoutEqual 包含不带等号的唯一文件路径后缀的变量。Contains the unique file path suffix variable without equal.
